meanings.definition: Cacomistles: a type of small, tree-dwelling mammal native to Central America.
meanings.sent1: The cacomistles are known for their agile movements in the trees.
meanings.sent2: We spotted a family of cacomistles during our hike in the rainforest.
meanings.sent3: The cacomistles decided to have a tree-climbing competition for fun.
meanings.sent4: The cacomistles moved through the branches like shadows in the night.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the cacomistles leaping from tree to tree was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: Cacomistles: the plural form of cacomistle, referring to multiple individuals of the species.
meanings.sent1: Look at all the cacomistles scurrying around the forest floor!
meanings.sent2: The cacomistles were busy foraging for food in the undergrowth.
meanings.sent3: The cacomistles held a meeting to discuss their next adventure.
meanings.sent4: The forest echoed with the chatter of the playful cacomistles.
meanings.sent5: The group of cacomistles moved together like a synchronized dance.
